name: Humidifier Install Template
Is the location drawing approved for construction
Humidifier is correct for the system/building
Check casing, fans, coils & duct for damage, report observations
Measure & mark location dimensions on site
Is Humidifier installed level & plumb
Are seismic restraints installed
Verify & record on drawing As-Built dimensions
Photos Taken
Signoff by Main Contractor or Engineer, if required
PVC Pipework Underground
Is the drawing approved for construction
Measure & mark off circuit dimensions on site
Has underground PVC mains pipe work been joined in accordance with the specification
Has pipe work been installed to the drawing
Check pipe work is installed to correct levels and falls
Pressure Test Pipe.
Verify & record on drawing As-Built dimensions
Photos Taken
Signoff by Main Contractor or Engineer, if required
